messages.subject: Fujii Kogen and his brother Fujii Taroemon --more help with Japanese texts?
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a link to a page that talks about Fujii Taroemon : http://tokyo.atso-net.jp/index.php?UID=1124286113 According to how I read it, it seems that this
messages.messageBody:
Here is a link to a page that talks about Fujii Taroemon :

http://tokyo.atso-net.jp/index.php?UID=1124286113


According to how I read it, it seems that this Fujii served as a
naval commander for the Mori navy and helped defend Honganji from
Nobunaga ... I assumed he fought against the Kuki navy then?
Also, I believe his branch of the family were/became big time
defenders of Buddhism and Buddhist communities and temples.

Also, I am looking for info on Fujii Saburozaemon, Kogen and
Taroemon's brother.

Also, I am looking for any info on FUjii Koemon, who started the
Inko Ryu Ninjutsu tradition .


HEre is the text on Fujii Taroemon from the page :
